amendment.description: Amendment retains the programs under the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children in the Department of Justice.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to return control over the Clearinghouse and Hotline on Missing and Runaway Children to the Department of Justice. Under the provisions of the bill, HHS would be responsible for the program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
